This is your Jeykll powered site. This base site, is a boilerplate that you can use to start your own project. You can add styles to this base site editing the style file located in css/style.css, editing index.html and, or, _layouts/default.html. On the other hand, this post is stored in the _posts folder and is written in markdown format.

Whatâ€™s in Jekyll base? This site comes with Bootstrap 3 and jQuery 2.0.3.

If you want to learn more about Jekyll and the Markdown technology, please refer to Jekyll documentation and Markdown documentation.
